headline: Halliburton (NYSE:HAL) Declares US$0.17 Q2 Dividend for 2025 Shareholders
summary: Halliburton (NYSE:HAL) recently declared a second-quarter dividend of $0.17 per share, scheduled for payment on June 25, 2025, which highlights the company's commitment to returning value to its shareholders. Over the past month, the company's share price experienced a 3.6% decline. The performance aligns with broader market volatility; stocks have seen a downward trend due to global trade tensions reignited by tariff threats. While Halliburton's product launch and successful endeavors in...
